meanings.sent1: The lineated notebook paper made it easy to write neatly.
meanings.sent2: The zebra's lineated coat helped it blend into the tall grass.
meanings.sent3: The lineated road looked like a giant ruler had been dragged across it.
meanings.sent4: Her lineated drawings resembled intricate spiderwebs on paper.
meanings.sent5: The lineated pattern on the fabric was reminiscent of a barcode.

meanings.sent1: The lineated map showed all the streets in the city.
meanings.sent2: The tree bark was lineated with deep grooves from years of growth.
meanings.sent3: The lineated cake icing looked like a maze of sugary paths.
meanings.sent4: His lineated handwriting made it easy to read his notes.
meanings.sent5: The lineated shadows on the wall resembled prison bars.

meanings.definition: Arranged in or consisting of lines
meanings.sent1: The lineated rows of corn stretched out as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: The lineated pattern on the floor tiles created a sense of order in the room.
meanings.sent3: The lineated arrangement of books on the shelf made them easy to find.
meanings.sent4: The lineated design on the wallpaper gave the room a modern look.
meanings.sent5: The lineated formation of geese flying overhead was a sight to behold.
